description.value:
Possessing tome gives +10 to all Medicae Tests and +20 to Medicae Tests to diagnose/treat disease. It, or a tome like it, may also help cure Aleynikov's Bane, May make -60 Medicae Test and at least a week of preperation per attempt. Cure provides +40 to Toughness Test to resist disease, and reduces required DoS from 5 to 3.

Requirements

A Tome covering diseases and treatments, including those relating to Aleynikov's Bane. Relics are unique, one of a kind items, they must be earned as opposed to acquired.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
